title: The Agent Loop
description: A minimal agent that uses only bash to accomplish tasks

steps.content: Create a file called hello.py that prints 'Hello, World!'
steps.annotation: User sends a task to the agent

steps.content: I'll create that file for you using bash.
steps.annotation: The model decides to use its only tool: bash
Tool call: the model generates a bash command

steps.content: Let me verify the file was created correctly.
steps.annotation: The loop continues: model sees the result and decides next action

steps.content: Done! I've created hello.py with the print statement. You can run it with `python hello.py`.
steps.annotation: stop_reason != 'tool_use' -> loop breaks, agent responds to user
